Name: hard coal, import from ZA | hard coal | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/05:Mining of coal and lignite/051:Mining of hard coal/0510:Mining of hard coal
Description: The coal is transported from the mines by train to the Richards Bay coal export terminal on the East coast of South Africa. An average rail transport distance of 550 km is derived from a weighted average of the production volumes by coalfield and the distance from the respective coalfields to the Richards Bay Coal Terminal. A distance of 9,250 km transoceanic freight transport is estimated as the average distance along freight shipping routes between Richards Bay and the major ports importing coal in India.
